name: Confusion of Tongues
description:
In the ancient desert of Mesopotamia, Architects and Builders toil to complete the Tower of Babel, all while suffering... the Confusion of Tongues!

Table Top Simulator Link:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2208202942

Confusion of Tongues is a 2-8 Player limited communication game where players draft a lexicon in teams of two, and compete to be the first to complete their build contract!

Design by Jason Brisson and Jeremy Moshe

Art by Rodrigo and Farhan
